thread.title: Nigeria: Desopadec Commissioner Hails Hostcom Support for Delta
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Desopadec Commissioner Hails Hostcom Support for Delta

title: Nigeria: Desopadec Commissioner Hails Hostcom Support for Delta
text:
Nigeria: APC Wants Presidency to Stop Probe of Fayemi - PDP 
Ofa recalled that before the last general election, he had appealed to HOSTCOM Youth Wing to vote or Okowa, as he praised and thanked them for the wonderful show of solidarity. 
The DESOPADEC Commissioner said that the Governor Okowa had listening ears and remarked that his Prosperity for all Deltans policy would lead to massive development and eradication of poverty and hunger from Delta state 
The President General of the Delta Central Youth Wing of HOSTCOM Hon. Kingsley Akpeninor, who led the other members of the body to Ofa, commended the commissioner for his benevolent and hard working spirit geared towards transforming the entire oil producing communities. Nigeria
